title: The Anthony Cumia Show 2016-02-02 Gavin McInnes Mike Finoia
description:
*** CAUTION: 100% UNCENSORED CONTENT!!! ***

-NOT FOR VIEWING BY CHILDREN OR THE FAINT OF HEART-


After 1 year of complete broadcasting freedom the Anthony Cumia Network is proud to launch their new studio in New York City! Current events, politics, news and anything can and will be discussed with celebrity guests and comedians stopping by as well. This show is not for those who are inclined to be " politically correct" and will contain boundary-pushing language and topics. Proceed with caution...

Guests: Gavin McInnes, Mike Finoia

Episode 307: Todayâ€™s TACS begins with the news that sweet Rat will be leaving the show, Gavin McInnes comes in to express his thoughts on Rat leaving, the guys rip Rat a new one, continue to rip him a new one, and rip him a new one some more. Gavin and Ant discuss last nightâ€™s caucus, Cruzâ€™s apology, Ben Carsonâ€™s B.O., stabbers, Hillary vs. Bernie, Bill Devane, and Guinea week continues as Mike Finoia takes a seat to talk about Italian cooking, hoarding, and stashing drugs. The guys yap about growing up, family sayings and similarities, old music, mixing drugs with music, coke nights, Bowie conspiracies, assisted death, a propped up poker game, inconsiderate fuckwad kids, and Mikeâ€™s marriage and roommate situation. Mike and Ant also chat about comedic timing, having a â€œfuck itâ€ mentality, getting into stand-up later in life, Greg Giraldo, Xanax, Dave Attell, old jobs, bullying, tipping, and we go back in time with old AT&T ads, brick phones, and modern conveniences.



Includes an MP4 video file and an MP3 audio file; download both or only what you need and please seed!
